thread_title: Enterprise OS V7 First Operational Session and Goal Creation

1_narrative.title: Narrative & Context
items: This was the first operational session for Enterprise OS V7. The session was brief, starting and ending on 2026-02-04. Two main actions were logged: the creation of a goal named 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London' with progress tracking, and the creation of the first operational state snapshot.

2_objectives.title: Objectives
items: Conduct the first operational session for Enterprise OS V7.
Create a goal for 'Property Connect London' with progress tracking.
Create an initial operational state snapshot.

3_success_criteria.title: Success Criteria
items: Session status marked as 'Complete'.
Goal 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London' created with progress tracking.
First operational state snapshot created.

4_decisions.title: Decisions & Rules
items: To initiate Enterprise OS V7 operations.
To structure goals with a 'GOAL_' prefix and include progress tracking.
To create operational state snapshots.

5_sops.title: SOPs / Workflows
items: Session logging procedure with timestamps, intent, and status.
Goal creation process including naming convention and progress tracking.
Operational state snapshot creation process.

7_inputs_outputs.title: Inputs & Outputs
items: Input: Session intent 'Enterprise OS V7 - First operational session'.
Output: Created 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London'.
Output: Created first operational state snapshot.
Output: Session log with 2 entries.

10_status.title: Status
items: Session status: Complete.
Work concluded successfully.

11_progress.title: Progress Markers
items: Enterprise OS V7 first operational session executed.
Milestone: First goal 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London' created.
Milestone: First operational state snapshot created.

13_dependencies.title: Dependencies
items: Enterprise OS V7 system as the operational platform.

14_entities.title: Entity Maps
items: Enterprise OS V7: The operational system version being used.
GOAL_Property_Connect_London: A specific goal created during the session, likely related to a property connection project in London.
Operational State Snapshot: A recorded state of the system or goals at a point in time.

15_glossary.title: Glossary
items: Enterprise OS V7: Version 7 of the Enterprise Operating System.
GOAL_: Prefix for goal entities within the system.
Operational State Snapshot: A capture of the current operational status and data.

16_future.title: Future
items: Future sessions will build upon this initial operational state.
Progress on 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London' will be tracked in subsequent sessions.

17_pending.title: Pending
items: Progress tracking and execution of 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London' is pending future work.

18_questions.title: Open Questions
items: What are the specific details and success criteria for 'GOAL_Property_Connect_London'?
What is the exact content and format of the operational state snapshot?

19_meta.title: Meta-Observations
items: The session was very brief (3 minutes), indicating it was an initialization or setup session.
The log structure is consistent, using timestamps and clear intent statements.
The system uses a formal naming convention for goals (GOAL_ prefix).

20_assets.title: Reusable Assets
items: Session log template with Start, Intent, Status, Work Log, and Session Summary sections.
Goal naming convention: 'GOAL_[Descriptive_Name]'.
Process for creating an operational state snapshot.

summary: This brief session successfully initiated operations for Enterprise OS V7 by creating a goal for 'Property Connect London' with progress tracking and establishing the first operational state snapshot, marking the system as ready for future work.
